text: FX is an American pay television channel owned by FX Networks, LLC. It is based at the Fox Studios lot in Century City, California. ==Programming== FX's most popular original shows include Justified, Damages, Nip/Tuck, Rescue Me, It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia, The League, Sons of Anarchy, The Shield, The Strain, Archer, American Horror Story, Anger Management, The Americans, Better Things, Louie, You're the Worst, Fargo, American Crime Story, Legion, Snowfall, Atlanta, and Welcome to Wrexham. ==Related pages== *FX Movie Channel *Fox Reality Channel == References == Category:American television channels
title: FX (TV channel)
